revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=R1524 |revision=SU |upc= |ean= |asin=B008Z628LK |price= |est_release_date=02/05/2002 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Virata |cpu1_model=Helium 210-80 (VC45210) |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Globespan |cpu2_model=GS7070-174 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT49BV1614-90TI |fla1_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16400A-7T |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit),USB 1.1 (slave) |expansion_pcmcia_num=2 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995X |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=ACTIONTEC |default_ssid_regex=^ACTIONTEC$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:20:E0 |oui_eth=00:20:E0 |default_ch=1 }} [http://www.actiontec.com/support/product_details.php?pid=88 Support page]
[http://www.modem-help.co.uk/Actiontec/R1524SU-11g-Wireless-Ready-DSL-Gateway.html On modem-help.co.uk] :USB ID noted as 1668:0405
This device works with (but may not be limited to) the following wireless modules.. *[[Actiontec 802CI3]] *[[Actiontec 802CI2]]
The device uses [[GlobespanVirata]] GS7070 and GT3180 chips for the ADSL modem.
"Actiontec 04493Ax" is silkscreened on the board.
There are (a total of 4) screws under the two side sections.
